bug.author: batu
bug.summary: Typo in Python API Docs: env.reset(train_model=True) --> env.reset(train_mode=True)
bug.description: There is a small typo in the documentation of the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/master/docs/Python-API.md>python API</denchmark-link> . The first argument passed into should be instead of as implemented <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/9b1a39982fd03de8f40f85d61f903e6d972fd2cc/ml-agents-envs/mlagents/envs/environment.py#L308>here</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/batu>@batu</denchmark-link> , thanks for your finding. Could you issue a PR on this please? We would be happy to merge it in. Remember to target towards the develop branch.
I fixed this on the develop branch.
